lyrics:
38 contributorssummer love lyricsintro zayn liam zayn  liam
yeah
ooh ooh

verse 1 zayn
cant believe youre packing your bags
trying so hard not to cry
had the best time and now its the worst time
but we have to say goodbye

prechorus 1 harry
dont promise that youre gonna write
dont promise that youll call
just promise that you wont forget we had it all

chorus zayn
cause you were mine for the summer
now we know its nearly over
feels like snow in september
but i always will remember

postchorus zayn all
you were my summer love
you always will be my summer love

verse 2 louis
wish that we could be alone now
if we could find some place to hide
make the last time just like the first time
push a button and rewind
you might also likeprechorus 2 liam
dont say the word thats on your lips
dont look at me that way
just promise youll remember when the sky is grey

chorus zayn all
cause you were mine for the summer
now we know its nearly over
feels like snow in september
but i always will remember

postchorus all zayn
you were my summer love
you always will be my summer love

bridge zayn  liam zayn  harry
so please dont make this any harder
we cant take this any further
and i know theres nothing that i wanna change change

chorus zayn  harry zayn harry all
cause you were mine for the summer
now we know its nearly over
feels like snow in september
but i always will remember will remember
postchorus zayn all louis niall harry
you were my summer love summer love
you always will be my summer love summer love
you always will be my summer love yeah
you always will be my summer love19embed
